testcase.name: Successful login
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters "user" as username and "pass" as password..............passed And clicks the login button.................................................passed Then the user should see "Login successful!"................................passed

testcase.name: Failed login
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters "wronguser" as username and "wrongpass" as password....passed And clicks the login button.................................................passed Then the user should see "Invalid credentials.".............................passed
